activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11627
activity.text: Fix: Show feedback for 'Resend OTP' button

activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#11627
activity.text:
Hi @maintainers,

I reviewed the OTP resend functionality and found that when the OTP fails to send, a feedback message is already triggered. The error handling is implemented in the handlePydanticErrors function inside ErrorHandler.ts, and I was able to see the corresponding toast notification during testing.

Since failure feedback was already in place, I focused on adding feedback for a successful OTP resend, as there was no notification for it. I made sure not to alter the existing failure handling and only implemented the missing success feedback.

Let me know if any further changes are needed.
